titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on viscose rayon staple fibers having a decitex of less than 5.0.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to decrease temporarily the duty on viscose rayon staple fibers having a decitex of less than 5.0.
